summary: ASTRA NOVA - Welcome to Astra Nova, an extraordinary venture born from the innovation hub of SpaceX. Astra Nova is not just an online school; it is an experimental haven designed for kind, independent, and daring young minds aged 10-14, available to students worldwide. As the successor to the renowned Ad Astra, Astra Nova stands as a non-profit online institution founded by visionaries Elon Musk and Joshua Dahn, nestled within the dynamic campus of SpaceX.
